So how do I use this map? I don't play on MC often /sadface

>> So how do I use this map? I don't play on MC often /sadface 
You take the file after you download it and put it into one of your saved world folders I believe(that or you make a new one specifically for this map. Tin or Pirate would probably have a better explanation)

1. open launcher
2. click options
3. follow link to game folder
4. open saves folder
5. make Goldcraft folder
6. insert world files there
7. enjoy.
